```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
all_data <- read_csv(here("cleaned_data/master_dataframe_distinct.csv"))
```

```{r}
all_data_gaps <- all_data %>% 
  seq(
  from = min(date_time),
  to = max(date_time),
  by = "10 mins"  # Adjust this to the desired time interval
)
```
